TopicTitle: A guide on setting up interiors and crew capcity in the .cfg

Articles.Content:
I keep noticing that people are having troubles with crews in the part.cfg, so I hope that this guide can give everyone a good grasp on the new crewable parts.

EXAMPLE:

How to make your parts unmanned (no messing with mechjeb!):

// --- internal setup ---

CrewCapacity = 0

INTERNAL

{

name = GenericSpace1

}

CrewCapacity = The amount of crew you wish. - Can be added to any part. Stuff crew members in a fuel tank if you wish.

Different internals:

PLANE COCKPITS:

GenericSpace1 - Used by the one crew cockpits.

GenericSpace3 - Used by the large 3 crew cockpit

CAPSULE INTERIORS:

Mk1PodCockpit - Used by small pod

Pod Cockpit - The large three seat capsule interior

Hope this was easy to follow info and I hope to see pods that have proper interior setups.

Edited October 4, 2012 by Nutt007
